nhc_headline: ...VERY HEAVY RAINS AND DAMAGING WINDS CONTINUE ACROSS MUCH OF  CENTRAL FLORIDA... ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCIES REMAIN IN EFFECT...
summary:
...VERY HEAVY RAINS AND DAMAGING WINDS CONTINUE ACROSS MUCH OF  CENTRAL FLORIDA... ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCIES REMAIN IN EFFECT...
 As of 2:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 10
 the center of Milton was located near 28.1, -81.3
 with movement ENE at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 975 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.
